insert into training (training_name, training_introduce, training_fee_normal, training_fee_vip, training_end_time, training_start_time, post_time, level, training_pic) values (#{trainingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trainingFeeVip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{trainingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update training
training_id = #{record.trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
training_name = #{record.trainingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_introduce = #{record.trainingIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_fee_normal = #{record.trainingFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
training_fee_vip = #{record.trainingFeeVip,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
training_end_time = #{record.trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
training_start_time = #{record.trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
post_time = #{record.postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
level = #{record.level,jdbcType=TINYINT},
training_pic = #{record.trainingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update training set training_id = #{record.trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, training_name = #{record.trainingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_introduce = #{record.trainingIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_fee_normal = #{record.trainingFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, training_fee_vip = #{record.trainingFeeVip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, training_end_time = #{record.trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, training_start_time = #{record.trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, post_time = #{record.postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, level = #{record.level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, training_pic = #{record.trainingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update training
training_name = #{trainingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_introduce = #{trainingIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_fee_normal = #{trainingFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
training_fee_vip = #{trainingFeeVip,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
training_end_time = #{trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
training_start_time = #{trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT},
training_pic = #{trainingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where training_id = #{trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update training set training_name = #{trainingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_introduce = #{trainingIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_fee_normal = #{trainingFeeNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, training_fee_vip = #{trainingFeeVip,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, training_end_time = #{trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, training_start_time = #{trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, training_pic = #{trainingPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where training_id = #{trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
